statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_referrals;
SELECT id, link, click_count FROM social_media_referrals WHERE share_count > 10;
SELECT id, link, click_count, share_count FROM social_media_referrals WHERE click_count < 5;
SELECT id, link, click_count, share_count FROM social_media_referrals ORDER BY click_count DESC;
SELECT id, link, click_count, share_count FROM social_media_referrals WHERE share_count > click_count;
SELECT * FROM social_media_referrals WHERE click_count > 100 ORDER BY share_count DESC, click_count ASC
SELECT id, link FROM social_media_referrals WHERE share_count < 50
SELECT id, click_count, share_count FROM social_media_referrals WHERE click_count > 50 AND share_count > 20 ORDER BY click_count DESC
SELECT * FROM social_media_referrals WHERE share_count = 0
SELECT id, link, click_count FROM social_media_referrals WHERE click_count BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY click_count
SELECT * FROM referral_links;
SELECT referral_id, link FROM referral_links WHERE clicks > 10;
SELECT * FROM click_tracking WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_clicks FROM click_tracking WHERE referral_id = 5;
SELECT referral_id, link, clicks, shares FROM referral_links WHERE clicks > shares;
SELECT * FROM referral_links WHERE clicks > 10 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT referral_id, link, shares FROM referral_links WHERE shares < 5 ORDER BY referral_id ASC;
SELECT link, clicks FROM referral_links WHERE clicks BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY link;
SELECT referral_id, COUNT(*) AS total_clicks FROM click_tracking GROUP BY referral_id HAVING total_clicks > 20;
SELECT * FROM click_tracking WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM links WHERE click_count > 100;
SELECT referral_source, click_count FROM links WHERE share_count > 50 ORDER BY click_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM clicks WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT link_id, referral_source, click_count, share_count FROM links WHERE link_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM links WHERE click_count > 10 ORDER BY click_count DESC;
SELECT link_id, referral_source, click_count FROM links WHERE click_count > 20 AND share_count > 5 ORDER BY click_count DESC, share_count ASC;
SELECT users.username, clicks.timestamp FROM users INNER JOIN clicks ON users.user_id = clicks.user_id WHERE users.email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT links.referral_source, users.username, clicks.timestamp FROM links INNER JOIN clicks ON links.link_id = clicks.link_id INNER JOIN users ON clicks.user_id = users.user_id;

SELECT users.username, links.referral_source, SUM(links.click_count) AS total_clicks FROM users INNER JOIN clicks ON users.user_id = clicks.user_id INNER JOIN links ON clicks.link_id = links.link_id GROUP BY users.username, links.referral_source;
SELECT * FROM social_media_referrals;
SELECT referral_id, link_clicks, shares, referral_source FROM social_media_referrals;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE 'example%';
SELECT referral_id, click_time FROM clicks ORDER BY click_time DESC;
SELECT referral_id, share_time FROM shares WHERE share_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%John%';
SELECT referral_id, link_clicks, shares FROM social_media_referrals WHERE link_clicks > 100 ORDER BY shares DESC;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(c.click_id) AS total_clicks FROM users u INNER JOIN clicks c ON u.user_id = c.user_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;

SELECT s.share_time, u.username, r.referral_source FROM shares s LEFT JOIN users u ON s.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN social_media_referrals r ON s.referral_id = r.referral_id ORDER BY share_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM link_clicks ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, referral_id, user_id FROM referrals WHERE website_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1001;
SELECT id, domain_name FROM websites WHERE website_name LIKE 'Example%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM link_shares;
SELECT * FROM link_clicks ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS click_count FROM link_clicks GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT referral_url, website_name FROM referrals JOIN websites ON referrals.website_id = websites.id WHERE website_name = 'example.com';
SELECT users.username, link_shares.share_timestamp FROM users INNER JOIN link_shares ON users.id = link_shares.user_id ORDER BY share_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM link_clicks WHERE click_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND user_id = 100 ORDER BY click_timestamp ASC LIMIT 20;
